metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31229 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The functionezxml_internal_dtd() performs incorrect memory handling while parsingcrafted XML files, which leads to an out-of-bounds write of a one byteconstant.

criterions.comment: mapcache: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
